title: tIrum en tollai
sahitya:
tIrum en tollai enru tiruccendUr vandEnE ArumukhanE undan aDi paNindAl uDanE


anupallavi

  pRinil nigahrillA tArakan nI tAn enru sIriya pugazh perugi sirappurum semmalE


caraNam    vEru tuNai enakkillai vENum un tuNai enru kOri varum bOdham tanai koDuttiDuvAi anrO
sUranaip-pOril venru vIra veTrik-koDiyODu sIralaivAit-talam tEDi senru kuDikoNDOnE
